abstract: The latest advertisement from The Pickens Plan uses Arabic script to paint a picture of energy insecurity.
snippet: The latest advertisement from The Pickens Plan uses Arabic script to paint a picture of energy insecurity.
lead_paragraph: As Clifford Krauss reports in today’s New York Times, T. Boone Pickens, the Texas billionaire who spent tens of millions over the last two years in an attempt to get Americans behind wind power, is “turning up the volume, and changing his pitch with some extra alarm bells.”

headline.main: Pickens Ad Focuses on Energy Security
